# Adding Dns Records To Squarespace

**URL:** https://www.mangomint.com/learn/adding-dns-records-to-squarespace/

## Category
13 Online Booking

## Subcategory
N/A

## Article Content

HOME
CAMPAIGNS
USING A CUSTOM EMAIL ADDRESS
Adding DNS Records to Squarespace

To send emails from a custom email address, you will need to copy your DNS records from Mangomint into your domain provider’s DNS settings.

If Squarespace is your domain provider, this article covers how to copy your DNS records from Mangomint into Squarespace.

Link copied
Adding DNS records to Squarespace

To copy your DNS records from Mangomint into Squarespace, log in to Squarespace and select Domains next to your website.

Select your Squarespace-managed domain.

Select DNS.

Select Add Record in the Custom records section.

In Mangomint, locate the Type for the DNS record and select that same type in Squarespace.

In Mangomint, copy the Host for the DNS record and paste it into the Host field in Squarespace.

In Mangomint, copy the Value for the DNS record and paste it into the Data field in Squarespace. Select Save to add the DNS record to Squarespace.

Repeat this process to copy your remaining DNS records from Mangomint into Squarespace.

Can't find what you're looking for?

Start a chat with us to talk to a real person and get your questions answered, or browse our on-demand videos.
